name: Cosmic Melody
description:
Mother planet has lost her children and misses their songs; please assist her by returning her beloved moons back home to her  - and brighten the galaxy with the melodies you collect!

An atmospheric, relaxed 2D puzzle/adventure game where the order you collect the lost moons determines the melody you will hear at the end. Enjoy finding all the lost moons and discovering all the many combinations of their unique cosmic melodies!

Emilia Hahl: Programming, Game Design, UI Design
Nanthakhwan Visithanon: Sound Design, UI Design, Character Design, Graphic Design
